decision_conditions: The Fire Risk Assessment does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12 of the London Plan (2021) and only includes generic basic information with inadequate details, specific to the site/development.  No details have been provided of suitably positioned outside space for fire appliances/ an evacuation assembly point, an evacuation strategy or means of escape, including for disabled persons, of the passive and active fire safety measures, fire alarm systems or construction details (other than general statements) or suitable access and equipment for firefighting. A statement of competence has also not been provided. Furthermore, fire risk issues were identified through the Fire Risk Assessment and it is not clear that these have been addressed.It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.

In the absence of a Travel Plan providing any specific, measurable and time-specific and implementable measures and targets, it has not been demonstrated that the proposal will satisfactorily promote sustainable forms of transport, contrary to policy T4 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
